blocks.name: wcel
blocks.content: Extend wff definition to include the membership connective between classes. For a general discussion of the theory of classes, see ~ mmset.html#class . (The purpose of introducing ` wff A e. B ` here is to allow us to express, i.e., "prove", the ~ wel of predicate calculus in terms of the ~ wcel of set theory, so that we do not "overload" the ` e. ` connective with two syntax definitions. This is done to prevent ambiguity that would complicate some Metamath parsers. The class variables ` A ` and ` B ` are introduced temporarily for the purpose of this definition but otherwise not used in predicate calculus. See ~ df-clab for more information on the set theory usage of ~ wcel .)
